result.execSummary:
The defendant Chad Allen McCarthy was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Vehicle Operator Flee/Elude Officer, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 11 days Rock Cty Jail in lieu of costs, consecutive to 1 yr RCJ, concurrent with any other sentence serving
Concurrent with any other sentence serving

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Chad Allen McCarthy

records.addlTxt: Defendant Chad Allen McCarthy in court in custody with attorney Kelly James Mattingly.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Guilty plea entered, court adjudicates guilty. Court orders: 1 year Rock Cty Jail concurrent with any other sentence serving, 11 days Rock Cty Jail in lieu of fine-consecutive to 12 mos, concurrent with any other sentence. Deportation warnings given.
Calendar call on April 9, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Chad Allen McCarthy in court in custody with attorney Shaun Drury for Kelly James Mattingly.  Kerra Stumbris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.   Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by Court, jury trial to be set.

Defendant Chad Allen McCarthy in court in custody with attorney Kelly James Mattingly.  Anne Theresa Nack appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Arraignment scheduled for February 12, 2015 at 04:00 pm.

Defendant Chad Allen McCarthy in court with attorney . Kerra Stumbris appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary Hearing requested Defendant Chad Allen McCarthy in court with attorney Kelly James Mattingly.  Gwanny J. Tjoa appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 9, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Chad Allen McCarthy in court in custody with attorney Kelly James Mattingly.  Gerald Anthony Urbik appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for January 23, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
